name: Little Journey (Paolino Maisto, Leonardo Martini, Silvia Begotto, 0nellama, leolaz99, Alezerb, ShayNick, Facchi)
name_original: Little Journey (Paolino Maisto, Leonardo Martini, Silvia Begotto, 0nellama, leolaz99, Alezerb, ShayNick, Facchi)
description:
Help the platypus find its place in the world, to overcome the adversity that will appear before him.

Strength lies in differences! 

Take part in the origin of THE PLATYPUS and discover how it all began! 

Eat, Swim, Survive! 

Gobble up as many shrimps as you can and beware the crocodiles!

Note to players: Thanks for playing our game, we really appreciate it! If you find any bugs, let us know in the comments or directly on our.
